front.title: Autoconfiguration of NOC services in ACP networks via GRASP

abstract.t: This document defines standards for the autoconfiguration of crucial NOC services on ACP nodes via GRASP. It enables secure remote access to zero-touch bootstrapped ANI devices via SSH/Netconf with Radius/ Diameter authentication and authorization and provides lifecycle autoconfiguration for other crucial services such as syslog, NTP (clock synchronization) and DNS for operational purposes.
